name: Northern Technologies International Corporation
description: Northern Technologies International Corporation (NTIC) is a global leader in providing environmentally friendly products and technologies that promote sustainability and corrosion protection. Established in 1970, NTIC specializes in the development and commercialization of innovative materials and solutions that serve various industries, including automotive, electronics, and metalworking. The company's flagship products include its proprietary corrosion inhibiting packaging and coatings, which are designed to protect metal parts and components during storage and shipment. NTIC is also committed to advancing sustainable practices through its Green Technologies division, which focuses on developing products that reduce environmental impact. With a strong emphasis on research and development, NTIC continuously seeks to enhance its product offerings and expand its market presence globally. The company's mission is to provide cost-effective solutions that meet customer needs while promoting environmental stewardship. NTIC operates through a network of subsidiaries and partners worldwide, enabling it to deliver high-quality products and services to its clients. With a reputation for innovation and a commitment to sustainability, NTIC is positioned as a key player in the corrosion protection market and continues to explore new opportunities for growth.
